duties_responsibilities.duty: Review accuracy of services provided and generate weekly charges
Generate EDI and paper claim forms and ensure timely filing
Manage claim corrections due to rejections or inaccuracies
Assist with claim resolution and timely reimbursement
Audit accounts for charge accuracy and submission of insurance claims
Research claim rejections and make corrections
Apply knowledge of billing and payment rules, managed care contracts, etc.
Evaluate accounts, resubmit claims, and perform adjustments
Respond to billing and collection inquiries and issues
Inform billing manager of trends and provide examples
Assist in providing education to reduce errors
Assist with accounting, billing, and payroll reconciliations
Perform other responsibilities and tasks as business demands

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED (Associate or Bachelor’s preferred)
